question: Which among the following is not a programme associated with the Housing for All – Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana (Urban)?
explanation:
The following programmes are associated with the Housing for All – Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana (Urban)-
1. “In-situ” Slum Redevelopment (ISSR)
2. Credit Linked Subsidy Scheme (CLSS)
3. Affordable Housing in Partnership (AHP)
4. Beneficiary-led individual house construction/enhancements (BLC)
